attributes.action: End cuts to Devon and Cornwall Police Service.
attributes.additional_details:
A senior Devon and Cornwall officer said the annual budget of £284m was expected to be cut by £54m.

Cuts will affect the teams which fight serious & organised crime, investigate rape & sexual violence & tackle hate crime.
attributes.background:
End cuts to Devon and Cornwall Police, bring back rural and local policing. 

More cuts may put the safety of People at risk. With crime already starting to rise, we call upon the Prime Minister to stop these damaging cuts before they seriously weaken the Force’s ability to keep us safe.
